title: Rapid catalytic reduction of environmentally toxic azo dye pollutant by Prussian blue analogue nanocatalyst
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15232-15239
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA07806J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Dina A. El Mously, Amr M. Mahmoud, Mohammed M. Gomaa, Hend Z. Yamani
The paper discusses the synthesis and catalytic activity of a promising, cost-effective, and stable Prussian blue analogue nanocatalyst for the rapid elimination of hazardous azo dye in industrial effluents.
